item.description: This week we're joined by Lori Solomon and Megan Painter of Boldly Chic Events. We talk with Lori and Megan about planning a timeless wedding, linens, installations, florals, and so much more.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ep. #021 - Bridal Party Bewilderment
item.description: This week we answer questions about bridesmaids and bridal parties. From what gifts to get them to how you can pick the right people for the job.
item.content:encoded:
This week we answer questions about bridesmaids and bridal parties. From what gifts to get them to how you can pick the right people for the job.

item.title: Ep. #020 - An Unfriendly Florist
item.description: This listener friended their vendors on facebook, and then found out their florist was making fun of their wedding. We talk about whether or not you should work with vendors that complain online and how to avoid unpleasant people.
item.content:encoded:
This listener friended their vendors on facebook, and then found out their florist was making fun of their wedding. We talk about whether or not you should work with vendors that complain online and how to avoid unpleasant people.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #019 - What Should You Do If Someone Wears White To Your Wedding?
item.description: We discuss what you should do if one of your guests tells you they're going to be wearing white to your wedding. We talk about how you can respond to that guest politely, and impolitely.
item.content:encoded:
We discuss what you should do if one of your guests tells you they're going to be wearing white to your wedding. We talk about how you can respond to that guest politely, and impolitely.

item.title: Ep. #018 - De-stressing by Beer Tasting
item.description: As you head out toward your wedding, or just out toward the rest of your life in general, it's important to take time to relax and rejuvenate your spirit.
item.content:encoded:
As you head out toward your wedding, or just out toward the rest of your life in general, it's important to take time to relax and rejuvenate your spirit.

item.title: Ep. #017 - The 10 Biggest Wedding Regrets
item.description: What are the top 10 biggest regrets you'll have after your wedding? We can't see into your personal future so we don't really know... But what we can do is dissect an article that claims to know what people who are married regret the most about their wedding.
item.content:encoded:
What are the top 10 biggest regrets you'll have after your wedding? We can't see into your personal future so we don't really know... But what we can do is dissect an article that claims to know what people who are married regret the most about their wedding.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #016 - The Truth About Sex
item.description: Coming straight off of a few weeks of talking together on other podcasts, where we made a lot of jokes about sex, we thought it would be a good idea to have a conversation about our first time having sex. Specifically, about the baggage we both brought into the relationship as a result of waiting till marriage to have sex and about how sex isn't always great for both people involved.
item.content:encoded:
Coming straight off of a few weeks of talking together on other podcasts, where we made a lot of jokes about sex, we thought it would be a good idea to have a conversation about our first time having sex. Specifically, about the baggage we both brought into the relationship as a result of waiting till marriage to have sex and about how sex isn't always great for both people involved.

Listen now →

item.title: Ep. #015 - Throwing a Wedding Party that Guests Won't Hate part 2
item.description: This is the thrilling follow up to last week's episode where we delved too deep into the minds of guests. Who knows what we awoke in the darkness? Your guests know. They know it well. This week we moved away from the ceremony and onto the reception, the real party.
item.content:encoded:
This is the thrilling follow up to last week's episode where we delved too deep into the minds of guests. Who knows what we awoke in the darkness? Your guests know. They know it well. This week we moved away from the ceremony and onto the reception, the real party.

item.title: Ep. #014 - Throwing a Wedding Party that Guests Won't Hate part 1
item.description: We talk about what upsets guests at weddings. There's no point in throwing a party if your guests aren't going to have a good time.

item.title: Ep. #013 - Picking Your Wedding Party

item.title: Ep. #012 - Do I Have to Go to My Stepson's Wedding?
item.description: If you don't get along with your stepson and he only ever hits you up when he wants money, do you have to go to his out of state wedding?

item.description: Ghosting your wedding vendors might feel tempting, but it can cause bigger headaches later. In this episode, we share why disappearing isn’t the best move and what to do instead.
